title: Tibbar memory config
description: Memory layout for Tibbar: banks (code/data, base, size, access). User configs are validated against this schema on load.

access.description: Permissions: r=read, w=write, x=execute. e.g. rx = code (no write), rw = data, rwx = unified.

data_reserve.description: When code and data share one bank, bytes to reserve at end for data (default 262144). Ignored when a separate data bank exists.

boot.description: 0-based offset into code region where execution starts; omitted means random.
